## Prerequisites

### Data Structures in base R
  1. Atomic vector (integer, double, logical, character)
  2. Recursive vector (list)
  3. Factor
  4. Matrix and array
  5. Data Frame

### R base programming
  1. Control Statements (`if/then/else`, `while`, `for`)
  2. Functions 
  3. Functionals (`[x]apply`)
  4. Input/output (`read.[x]/write.[x]`)
  5. Rstudio IDE
